sections.heading: Television translator stations; construction by political subdivisions.Section 5-2-2 - Appropriation prohibited.
sections.text:
Any county or municipality in the state is authorized to appropriate annually from its general fund a reasonable sum for the acquisition, construction, improvement or maintenance of translator stations for the purpose of receiving and transmitting television broadcasting signals.

History:1953 Comp., ยง 11-6-41, enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 311, ยง 1.

sections.heading: Appropriation prohibited.
sections.text:
No county or municipality shall appropriate from its general fund to acquire, improve or maintain any translator station originally or hereafter constructed or presently or hereafter licensed and maintained by a commercial television station.

History:1953 Comp., ยง 11-6-42, enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 311, ยง 2.
